author: Nintendo of America
description:
Ready… Fight! Mortal Kombat: Legacy Kollection is out now on Nintendo Switch 2 & Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/mortal-kombat-legacy-kollection-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01   

Test your might in multiple klassic games from the ‘90s and early 2000s, including arcade, console, and handheld versions. Experience the legendary origins of the franchise, enhanced with player-friendly features including online play with rollback netcode, Fatality Trainer, and more. Friendship or flawless victory, how will you klimb to the top? 

#NintendoSwitch #NintendoSwitch2 #MortalKombat 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nintendoamerica
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nintendo
title: Mortal Kombat: Legacy Kollection – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Episode seven of the #Splatoon3 North American League Show is available now! Get a recap of last week's action and check out some fun segments like Exploring Alterna!

Watch this week's Splatoon 3 North American League Event #7 livestream on Saturday, Nov 1st at 4pm PT here: https://youtube.com/live/o-Qtad-3ec4

Interested in competing? Register here: https://battlefy.com/nintendovs/splatoon3-north-american-league/

Nintendo Switch Online membership (sold separately) and Nintendo Account required for online features. Membership auto-renews after initial term at the then-current price unless canceled. Not available in all countries. Internet access required for online features. Terms apply. nintendo.com/purchase-terms/

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
Instagram: https://www.ins
title: The Splatoon 3 North American League Show – Episode 7

author: Nintendo of America
description:
SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide comes to #NintendoSwitch2 on Nov 18, 2025! Pre-order and play the demo today: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/spongebob-squarepants-titans-of-the-tide-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01  

Team up with Patrick to explore the mayhem caused by the Flying Dutchman and King Neptune. Pre-order now and get the Natural Costume Pack for SpongeBob and Patrick!  

#NintendoSwitch2 #SpongeBobSquarePants 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s
